trends: There has been one other sighting in Chapin
There were no other sightings in Chapin on or around October 24th 1990
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking outside of the back door at my house, i just go outside to look at the sky every now and then, ususaly at night because im a night owl.. lol when i first saw it i thought it was a plane it first came into view behind the limbs of a tree then i noticed once it had cleared the tree that it was round... like perfectly round.. it was wobeling back and fourth a little but the thing i thought was the weirdest was it made no noise.. and it want very far off the ground... either that or it was huge.. but it didnt seem like it was far away.. i finalyl ost sight of the object when it got to the line of the roof of my house, i went fr4om the back door out to the porch but it never came over the other side... i wastched for about 3 minutes thinking maybe it had turned but i walked out into the yard and looked and didnt see anything anywhere... and that would of had to of been one hell of a turn
